subgoals.name: Do do some tests to check your progress
Purchase running gear appropriate for running training
Adopt a good running style suited to you
Consider joining a running group or club
Move on to a half marathon

name: Bake a cake for someone special

subgoals.name: Preheat the oven to 325 °F (163 °C) and grease and flour a cake pan
Pour the batter into the pan
Bake the cake for 1 hour 15 minutes
Do it first thing each morning
Check in with how you’re feeling
Don’t worry too much that you’re doing it wrong
Decide what type of pet you want
Think carefully if you really want a pet
Learn about the pet you have chosen
Eat 5 servings of fruits and veggies a day
Make sure that this is what you really want to do
Decide what kind of dancing you would enjoy doing
Sign up for as many dance classes as possible
Figure out why you want to go on a road trip, and make sure it's a good reason
Plan your destinations, if you have any
Cut places if you need to
Think of the type of transportation you'll take
Know where you're going to sleep
Plan what you'll do for food
Make sure there's as stations where you're going
Plan out who's gonna be driving when
